import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' const ForecastItem = ({weekDay, hour, state, temperature}) => { return (
{weekDay} {hour} [icono] {state} {temperature}Â°
) } ForecastItem.propTypes = { weekDay: PropTypes.string.isRequired, hour: PropTypes.number.isRequired, state: PropTypes.string.isRequired, temperature: PropTypes.number.isRequired, } export default ForecastItem
